T02D2153:248b-1: kushmandotsh'a dha pre ta pi sh'a tsa ye bi sho dha ya har s'a dha n'a ma /
T02D2153:248b-3: yi dags dang sha za dang grul bum dang srul
T02D2153:248b-4: bo rnams rnams par sbyong zhing sel ba'i sgrub thams
T02D2153:248b-5: shes bya ba // 'phags pa lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2153:248b-6: sku gsum pha rol phyin drug ldan //
T02D2153:248b-7: sdug bsngal rgya mtsho las sgrol ba'i //
T02D2153:248b-8: rdo rje can la gus btud de //
T02D2153:248b-9: sems can rnams la phan phyir bri //
T02D2153:248b-10: sngon du bsnyen ba rab rdzogs pas //
T02D2153:248b-11: yan lag tshon snas rab bcings nas //
T02D2153:248b-12: lha yi rnam pa gsal bsgoms te //
T02D2153:248b-13: rtags ni rab tu gsal ba brtag / brtags zin nas ni sgrub pa brtsam //
T02D2153:248b-14: sa yi cho ga rdzogs byas la //
T02D2153:248b-15: sta gon legs par rdzogs nas ni //
T02D2153:248b-16: dkyil 'khor thig skud byin rlabs gdab //
T02D2153:248b-17: ye shes thig gdab sa thig ni //
T02D2153:248b-18: tshangs thig nas bzung sgo rgyan bar //
T02D2153:248b-19: legs shing rdzogs par gdab par bya //
T02D2153:248b-20: de nas tshon dgye dbus nyi dkyil //
T02D2153:248b-22: kha dog so so gru chad ljang //
T02D2153:248b-23: rdo rje ra ba lha snam rigs //
T02D2153:248b-24: mtshan ma sa bon rab tu dgod //
T02D2153:248b-25: shar nas brtsams te 'khor la lo ral gri dang //
T02D2153:248b-26: dgra sta rdo rje kha dog so sor bri //
T02D2153:248b-27: shar lho nas bzung lcags kyu gri gug dang //
T02D2153:248b-28: mi mgo dang ni rgyu ma'i zhags pa bri //
T02D2153:248b-29: mtshams su gtor ma phyogs su thod pa bkram //
T02D2153:248b-30: dbus su sku gdung gur dang bla re bre //
T02D2153:248b-31: lha snam phyo gas skyong gtor ma so sor dgram //
T02D2153:248b-32: bum pa phyogs bzhir las bum shar sgor gzhag / mdun du bla ma yi dam lha //
T02D2153:248b-33: sbyan drangs mchod nas stong nyid bsgom //
T02D2153:248b-34: de nas h'um las sa gzhi ra ba gur du gyur pa'i rdo rje me 'od bcas //
T02D2153:248b-35: de nas bh'um las gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs bcas shing dbang po nyi zla'i gdan //
T02D2153:248b-36: de steng bdag nyid gsum gyi tshul gyis zhal gsum phyag drug bskyed //
T02D2153:249a-0: mdun du h'um las dga' rab dbang phyug thod phreng can dang bum rna sha @249a * //
T02D2153:249a-2: thal dkar mdog dang gnag dang sngo dang shin tu
T02D2153:249a-3: gnag / g-yas na 'khor lo ral gri dgra sta
T02D2153:249a-4: rdo rje dang // g-yon na bsdigs pa'i sdigs mdzub bo //
T02D2153:249a-5: shin tu 'jigs pa'i bdag nyid can //
T02D2153:249a-6: thal bas lus byugs khrag 'dzag pa'o //
T02D2153:249a-7: mtshams rnams su ni me tog ma dang mdzes ldan dang ni 'od zer 'phrog dang mdangs 'phrog ma'o //
T02D2153:249a-8: g-yas na lcags kyu gri gug mi mgo rgyu ma'i zhags //
T02D2153:249a-9: g-yon na thod pa khrag gis bkang ba'o //
T02D2153:249a-10: smug nag mthing nag dmar nag ljang nag 'jigs ba'i gzugs can bdud mo bzhi'o //
T02D2153:249a-11: thugs ka'i re pa'i h'um las spyan drangs bstim sogs rdzogs byas nas //
T02D2153:249a-12: gsang ba'i sngags ni rab tu bzlas //
T02D2153:249a-13: aom kushman bi dha ra ya h'um phat /
T02D2153:249a-14: dods'a dha na kro ha ya h'um phat /
T02D2153:249a-15: pre ta bi sa na ya phat /
T02D2153:249a-16: bi sh'a tsa ha ta ba ba phat sv'a h'a /
T02D2153:249a-17: ku shaman kra m'a ya phat /
T02D2153:249a-18: dotsh'a ta na kri t'a na ya phat /
T02D2153:249a-19: pre ta kri t'a nta r'u pa ya phat /
T02D2153:249a-20: pi sh'a tse ro sha na ya tha ta sv'a h'a /
T02D2153:249a-22: sngon du bsnyen pas bsgrub bya'i rtags ni rim pa
T02D2153:249a-23: drug par brtag / rtags byung bskrad pa'i las brtsam
T02D2153:249a-24: mo // yam las rlung bsams steng du bskyed //
T02D2153:249a-25: dgug cing autstsha ta yas bskrad //
T02D2153:249a-26: las bcol phrin las gzhan yang brtsam //
T02D2153:249a-27: rabs chad nag po'i thod par ni //
T02D2153:249a-28: gzugs gzhug bsad pas dur khrod sba //
T02D2153:249a-29: h'um me dpung 'bar ba brjid pa'i sku //
T02D2153:249a-30: gad rgyangs bzhad mdzad thal mo rdebs //
T02D2153:249a-31: rgya mtshor zhabs nub dbang po mnan //
T02D2153:249a-32: sku gsum don ldan zhal 'dzum bzhad //
T02D2153:249a-35: aom badzra mu:zhes pas gshegs su gsol nas bsdu ba'o //
T02D2153:249a-36: bdag gis gzhan la phan phyir brtsam //
T02D2153:249a-38: bla med byang chub thob par shog / nam gru'i
T02D2153:249a-39: rigs las byung ba'i slob dpon dz'a ba ri pas
T02D2153:249a-40: mdzad pa'i bdud bzlog pa'i cho ga rdzogs so /
T02D2153:249a-42: // khal po'i bla ma de ba p'urna ma ti dang /
